captions.text:
- OUR FIRST GUEST IS ONE OF
THE HILARIOUS STARS

BUT AFTER WHAT I'VE DONE TO HIM
IN THE PAST,

START TALKING AS SOFIA.
YOU JUST...

[normal voice]
OR WHATEVER YOU WANT, OKAY?

- [singing]
BABY, EVEN THOUGH I HATE YOU

- BECAUSE MY DOG IS SCARED
OF GOING UP AND DOWN THE STAIRS.

THAT'S WHAT I THOUGHT IT WAS.
I THOUGHT HE WAS SCARED.

- FROM "MODERN FAMILY,"
PLEASE WELCOME ERIC STONESTREET.

I GOT ONE LESS PROBLEM
WITHOUT YOU

I GOT
ONE LESS PROBLEM WITHOUT YOU

- I GOT ONE LESS,
ONE LESS PROBLEM

I GOT ONE LESS PROBLEM
WITHOUT YOU

I GOT
ONE LESS PROBLEM WITHOUT YOU

- I GOT ONE LESS,
ONE LESS PROBLEM
- THESE ARE MY TWO BEST FRIENDS,

PAUL AND STACEY, HERE
TO HAVE MY BACK TODAY, ELLEN.

- YOU KNOW, I THOUGHT
WE WERE FRIENDS.

YOU PROVED,
THE LAST COUPLE TIMES,

YOU AND YOUR PRODUCTION STAFF
DON'T GIVE TWO CENTS ABOUT ME.

OR MY UNDERWEAR,
BECAUSE I ABOUT CRAPPED THEM
THE LAST TIME I WAS HERE.

SO I'M RELYING ON FRIENDSHIP
TODAY.
SO PAUL AND STACEY ARE HERE.
THEY TOOK OFF A DAY'S WORK.

A GUY IN A DOG COSTUME,
A CLOWN COSTUME,

A TRANSPARENT 1930s GIRL
WITH A RAG DOLL

DON'T HESITATE TO INTERRUPT
THE INTERVIEW, OKAY?

- WELL, LOOK, THEY CAN--
THEY CAN'T--

THEY CAN STAY BACK THERE,
'CAUSE NOBODY'S COMING OUT.

I PROMISE.
NO ONE'S COMING OUT.

WE NEED A CODE WORD.
WE NEED A CODE WORD.

- THAT'S A GOOD CODE.
THAT'S A REALLY GOOD CODE.

- THOSE Q AND As ARE FUN, ELLEN,
BUT WHAT--

SOMETIMES EMBARRASSING THINGS
HAPPEN IN THOSE THINGS.

I WAS IN UTAH
DOING ONE AT A COLLEGE,

AND THESE TWO GIRLS GOT UP
IN THE MIDDLE OF MY Q AND A

I MEAN, YOU'VE JUST LOST
ONE OF YOUR--

NO, ONE OF YOUR FAVORITE GUESTS,
YOU JUST LOST HIM.

- GOOD JOB.
WAY TO GO, GUYS.

SO, WAIT, I WANT TO HEAR
THE STORY,

'CAUSE I WANT TO HEAR
THE EMBARRASSING,

BUT WE'RE GONNA TAKE A BREAK,
AND YOU'LL--

title: Ellen Scared Eric Stonestreet Even Better!
